game.name: SUKIMA: The Creeping Gap
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Color Alternatives, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A gap somewhere in your room begins to open on its own, little by little. If you can’t find it and close it before it opens completely—. A first-person escape game centered around the fear of gaps.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A gap somewhere in your room begins to open on its own, little by little. If you can’t find it and close it before it opens completely—. A first-person escape game centered around the fear of gaps.
